1\n            while lo <= hi:\n                mid = (lo + hi) // 2\n                numBelow = mid\n                lower = None\n                if mid > 0:\n                    lower = a[mid - 1]\n                \n                if mid == half:\n                    if b and b[0] < a[mid]:\n                        numBelow += 1\n                elif mid < half:\n                    remaining = half -
